body.p: I inclose herewith a petition in favor of Bill Owens -- The fines were imposed by the Woodford Court at the October Term past -- Owens was absent and by an arrangement with The attorney for the Commonwealth I confessed judgement for him -- he has paid the attorneys part of the fines and now asks a remission of the remainder. I think it a case for executive interference and I hope you will pesent to his favorable consideration and much oblige your friend
